summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from Jordy Feldman, an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA), indicating they are traveling for work and may have delayed email responses. The email is related to the Proposed Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

persons.name: Jordy Feldman
persons.context: Sender of the automatic out-of-office email reply, identified as an AUSA working on the Epstein case, specifically the Proposed Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

keyFacts: The email is an automatic reply from AUSA Jordy Feldman dated December 13, 2019.
Jordy Feldman was traveling for work related to the Epstein case, indicating active legal proceedings or program administration at that time.
The email subject references the 'Proposed Epstein Victims' Compensation Program', confirming its existence and that AUSAs were involved in its administration.
The email suggests other AUSAs were also assigned to the case for continuity during Feldman's travel.
